law.catch_line: Except for a violation of § 12.5-505(a) of this subtitle, a person that violates any provision of t...
law.text: Except for a violation of § 12.5-505(a) of this subtitle, a person that violates any provision of this subtitle is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to a fine not exceeding $10,000 or imprisonment not exceeding 2 years or both.
